New_Rochelle.Nereid Avenue (IRT White Plains Road Lin: Nereid Avenue ( ; formerly East 238th Street; is a local station on the IRT White Plains Road Line of the New York City Subway, located at the intersection of Nereid Avenue (East 238th Street) and White Plains Road in the Bronx. It is served by the 2 train on weekdays and the 5 train on weekends and during rush hour and the northern terminal for most peak-direction rush-hour 5 trains that use this branch. All 2 trains, 5 trains on weekends, and a limited number of northbound a.m.
